title: Lettering tutorials
content: Hi does anyone know of any good tutorials on creating logos or lettering with 'swashes' similar to some Baseball badges, or even the Coke logo at a push. Really I'm after a more rounded look but anything to get me on the road to understanding how to hand draw them. Cheers, stay frosty.
author: anonymous

comments.content: d, I don't know where you are from but look to find either a Calligraphy site or a Calligraphy teacher. It will go a long way for you to understand how swashes evolved.
